title: ClearLagg谁帮我汉化一下那个插件，汉化红字的就行了
txt_content:
本帖最后由 104417372 于 2014-8-22 08:47 编辑 

#--------------------------------------------------------------------#
#                   ClearLag Configuration File                      #
#--------------------------------------------------------------------#
# Configure to your liking, reload the config by tying: /lagg reload #
#                                -                                   #
#        Here is a helpful tutorial on this configuration setup!     #
#   http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/clearlagg/pages/config-setup/  #
#--------------------------------------------------------------------#
#                     All possible mob names                         #
# http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mod ... es/mob-types/nodes/ #
#--------------------------------------------------------------------#
settings:
  auto-update: true
  enable-signs: true
  config-version: 1
  disable-waterlife: true
  keep-spawn-in-memory: true
  enable-api: true

#What type of entities SHOULD NOT be removed while doing /lagg area?
area-filter:
    - Itemframe
    - Painting
    - Wolf
    - Villager
    - Horse

#Should clearlag reset the config (more stable), or attempt to add the new paths into your config?
# -- Puting this as false wont reset your config, but may cause bugs.. Still in testing!
config-updater:
  force-update: false

#This limits the mob egg spawners so players cannot "overload" the server with them
# -- 'check-radius' stands for the radius clearlag will check for nearby entities
# -- 'max-mobs' is how many entities may be in the radius before the spawning is blocked
mobegg-limiter:
  enabled: false
  check-radius: 8
  max-mobs: 5

#Disable new chunk generation, or just put a cap on how many can load at once.
# -- THIS DOES NOT WORK WITH 1.6.4!
chunk-limiter:
  enabled: false
  limit: 6000
  create-new-chunks: true

#This modifies not only the view of the mobs, but will also simplify how they spawn
# -- Lower it is, the better your entity tick will be
# -- If it's too high, expect bugs / lots of lag
mob-range:
  enabled: false
  zombie: 30
  skeleton: 30
  creeper: 20

#How long should items/Mobs be left on the ground
# -- Goes by seconds
live-time:
  enabled: false
  interval: 10
  mobtimer: true
  itemtimer: true
  arrowtimer: true
  arrowkilltime: 15
  moblivetime: 40
  itemlivetime: 40

#Let clearlag control the spawning in ALL worlds? (Supports all plugins!)
# -- This will also respect cancelations, unlike minecraft's native code
custom-mobspawner:
  enabled: false
#How many times should clearlag attempt to find a safe location for the mob to spawn
  max-tries: 50
#(In seconds) how often should clearlag try to spawn mobs?
  interval: 30
#This is the radius around the player
  radius: 30
#This is the radius FROM the player (in blocks!)
  radius-from: 7
#How far should mobs spawn from eachother (NOT in blocks!!) (1,010 = around 10-20 blocks)
  mob-radius: 1010
#Should we keep trying to spawn a mob if a clear location isn't found
  forcespawn: false
#4 = nighttime, what light level should mobs spawn in
  lightlevel: 4
#Chance mobs will have armor/sword, 1 being diamond every time
  armor-chance: 30 
  mobs: #More types of a mob, more likely it'll spawn(ONLY IN NORMAL WORLDS!)
    - zombie 5
    - skeleton 3
    - creeper
    - enderman
  animals: #More types of a mob, more likely it'll spawn(ONLY IN NORMAL WORLDS!)
    - pig 4
    - sheep 1
    - cow 6
    - chicken 2

#This option disallows the placement of too many tnt-minecarts
tnt-minecart:
  enabled: false
  max: 2
  radius: 6

#This option reduces global dispenser rate
dispenser-reducer:
  enabled: false
  time: 100

#This option reduces the explosions of mass amounts of tnt, and reduces tnt lag
tnt:
  tnt-reducer: false

#This option reduces fire spread rate
firespread-reducer:
  enabled: false
  time: 2000

#How many entities should one chunk be allowed to hold?
chunk-entity-limiter:
  enabled: false
  limit: 40

spawn-limiter:
  enabled: false
  interval: 15
  monsters: 300
  animals: 300

#Meters your TPS, if it goes to low, run the commands you wrote below!
tps-meter:
  enabled: false
  interval: 15 
  tps-trigger: 14.0
  commands:
    - 'lagg killmobs'
    - 'lagg clear'

#This is /lagg killmobs, put what you DON'T want removed! 
kill-mobs:
   disable-build-wither: false 
   mob-filter:
        - Villager
        - Wolf
        - Horse

#This takes care of mob spawners
mobspawner:
  enabled: false
  max-spawn: 4

#No longer bugged! -- Dont use if you have CB++ or Spigot!
item-merger:
  enabled: false
  radius: 6

#Auto-removal options
# -- warnings works like this; time = the time warning should be given, msg = warning message at that time
# -- NOTE: The below 'remove' section applies to this remover!
# -- NOTE: Putting the interval to low will cause issues!
auto-removal:
  broadcast-message: '&6[扫地娘] &a清理了 +RemoveAmount 个地面垃圾.'
  broadcast-warning: true
  enable-scheduler: true
  autoremoval-interval: 460
  warnings:
        - time:400 msg:&4[ClearLag] &cWarning Ground items will be removed in &7+remaining &cseconds!
        - time:440 msg:&4[ClearLag] &cWarning Ground items will be removed in &7+remaining &cseconds!

#What should be removed during an auto-removal
remove:
  world-filter:
    - this_world
  broadcast-removal: true
  boat: true
  falling-block: true
  experienceOrb: true
  painting: true
  projectile: true
  item: true
  itemframe: false
  minecart: true
  primed-tnt: true
  arrow: true
  snowball: true
  fireball: true
  ender-signal: true
  item-filter:
  # - 264
  # - 265
  # - 311
  # - 312
  # - 266
  mobs:
  # - cow

#What should be removed during /lagg clear 
command-remove:
  world-filter:
    - this_world
  broadcast-removal: false
  boat: true
  falling-block: true
  experienceOrb: true
  painting: true
  projectile: true
  item: true
  itemframe: false
  minecart: true
  primed-tnt: true
  arrow: true
  snowball: true
  fireball: true
  ender-signal: true
  item-filter:
  # - 264
  # - 265
  # - 311
  # - 312
  # - 266
  mobs:
  # - cow

check:
  world-filter:
    - this_world
  boat: true
  falling-block: true
  experienceOrb: true
  painting: true
  projectile: true
  item: true
  itemframe: false
  minecart: true
  primed-tnt: true
  arrow: true
  snowball: true
  fireball: true
  ender-signal: true
  item-filter:
  # - 264
  # - 265
  # - 311
  # - 312
  # - 266
  mobs:
    creature: true
    animals: true
    monster: true

limit:
  enable-limit: false
  max: 1000
  check-interval: 60
  broadcast-message: '&6[扫地娘] &a清理了 +RemoveAmount 个地面垃圾.!'
  world-filter:
    - this_world
  broadcast-removal: true
  boat: true
  falling-block: true
  experienceOrb: true
  painting: true
  projectile: true
  item: true
  itemframe: false
  minecart: true
  primed-tnt: true
  arrow: true
  snowball: true
  fireball: true
  ender-signal: true
  item-filter:
  # - 264
  # - 265
  # - 311
  # - 312
  # - 266

replies.txt_content:

 msg:&6[扫地娘]  ...
样例：
warning-message: '&b&l【人工智能】 &4前方高能!贵重物品请提前捡起.'
broadcast-message: '&b&l【人工智能】 &a高能完毕.清除+RemoveAmount物品!'

replies.author: losew
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 losew 于 2014-8-22 11:35 编辑 
104417372 发表于 2014-8-22 11:18
有人吗----------------

可以自己改--仁兄--
在clearlag文件夹中的OLDconfig里改，找到这一段。
#Auto-removal options
auto-removal:
（（这只是个例子= =）&1-9皆为颜色，具体自己查。
warning-message: （“clearlag颜色）'&4[ClearLag] （文字颜色）&6将在 &160 秒后&5丐帮入侵MC,所到之处，有啥捡啥。T贵重掉落物O品请提前捡起N!'
（清理完公告） broadcast-message: '&6[ClearLag] &a清理了 +RemoveAmount 件垃圾!'
broadcast-warning: true
enable-scheduler: true
autoremoval-interval: 400
warning-delay: 60
自己改吧--

losew 发表于 2014-8-22 11:32
可以自己改--仁兄--
在clearlag文件夹中的OLDconfig里改，找到这一段。

应该改在config文件夹吧，不是那个OLDconfig文件夹吧
CLEARLAG有多个config，config是用来改清除物品及生物种类及数量的，customclear是自定义清理，OLDconfig是改标语啊啥的--

replies.author: hankzty@qq.com
replies.txt_content: 不建议用这个插件。MC原版本身设定的就是3分钟清理。所以这个根本没必要。而且我觉得clear插件要更有用一些。

replies.author: ybw0014
replies.txt_content:
hankzty@qq.com 发表于 2014-8-22 23:37
不建议用这个插件。MC原版本身设定的就是3分钟清理。所以这个根本没必要。而且我觉得clear插件要更有用一些 ...
5分钟清理。

ybw0014 发表于 2014-8-23 07:24
5分钟清理。
问一下，怎么改clearlag的清理时间

ybw0014 发表于 2014-8-23 07:24
5分钟清理。
怎么改清理时间！！！

replies.author: ybw0014
replies.txt_content:
104417372 发表于 2014-8-23 13:39
怎么改清理时间！！！auto-removal:
  warning-message: '&b&l【人工智能】 &4前方高能!贵重物品请提前捡起.'
  broadcast-message: '&b&l【人工智能】 &a高能完毕.清除+RemoveAmount物品!'
  broadcast-warning: true
  enable-scheduler: true
  autoremoval-interval: 180
  warning-delay: 30复制代码
autoremoval-interval是清理间隔（单位：秒），我这里设置的是每3分钟清理一次。
warning-delay是清理等待时间（单位：秒），就是高能预警后多少秒开始清理垃圾，这里是30秒。

ybw0014 发表于 2014-8-23 15:17
autoremoval-interval是清理间隔（单位：秒），我这里设置的是每3分钟清理一次。
warning-delay是清理等 ...
不行，改了之后就只显示清理的了

replies.author: ybw0014
replies.txt_content:
104417372 发表于 2014-8-23 20:15
不行，改了之后就只显示清理的了
突然注意到你的这是1.7的ClearLag配置有所变动
新配置设置：
auto-removal:
  broadcast-message: '&b&l【人工智能】 &a高能完毕.清除+RemoveAmount物品!'
  broadcast-warning: true
  enable-scheduler: true
  autoremoval-interval: 180
  warnings:
       - time:150 msg:&b&l【人工智能】 &4前方高能!贵重物品请提前捡起.复制代码
autoremoval-interval是清理间隔
warnings: - time:150这个是180-30得来的。
